name: Cognitive Restructuring
description: A structured approach to help clients identify, challenge, and reframe limiting beliefs through evidence-based cognitive techniques.

limiting_belief.title: Identify Limiting Belief
limiting_belief.description: Record the client's current thought or belief causing difficulty

supporting_evidence.title: Evidence Supporting the Belief
supporting_evidence.description: List evidence that supports this belief

contradicting_evidence.title: Evidence Contradicting the Belief
contradicting_evidence.description: List evidence that contradicts this belief

new_belief.title: Create New Belief
new_belief.description: Reframe into a balanced, empowering alternative belief

real_world_application.title: Test & Apply
real_world_application.description: Note how the new belief influences choices/behaviors in real contexts

progress_log.title: Progress Log
progress_log.description: Track shifts in thinking and resilience over time

outcomes_insights.title: Outcomes & Insights
outcomes_insights.description: Record observed changes in behavior and mindset
